DOC.brief_summary: This simple registry patient undergo PCI hospital without surgery on-site participant CPORT-E project . The aim registry simple data collection reporting respective State Departments Health . The registry population consist patient undergo diagnostic cardiac catheterization suspect CAD hospital without SOS require PCI .
DOC.brief_title: Registry Non-primary Angioplasty Hospitals Without Surgery On-site
DOC.criteria: Patient inclusion criterion : Precatheterization 1. must undergo diagnostic cardiac catheterization suspect CAD 2. least 18 year age 3. must pregnant ( negative pregnancy test ) must childbearing potential 4. must able give informed consent . Postcatheterization 5. coronary artery disease judge clinically angiographically significant 6. ability perform PCI equipment available local site ( see ) 7. procedure risk judge high ( see ) Patient exclusion criterion : Precatheterization 1. inability give inform consent 2 . STsegment elevation myocardial infarction 3. pregnancy Postcatheterization 4. high likelihood require device available hospital without SOS ( see ) 5. need PCI 6. need coronary artery bypass surgery 7. high procedural risk ( see )
